trans-unit.source: Defines the smallest unit of a code access security permission set for messaging.
trans-unit.target: 定義程式碼存取安全性權限為訊息設定的最小單位。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Code Access Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry"></xref> class with the specified permission access levels and the path of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry"></xref>類別的指定權限的存取層級與佇列的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.PermissionAccess*> property is set to this value.
The path of the queue that is referenced by the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 佇列所參考的路徑<xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.Path*> property is set to this value.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry"></xref> class with the specified permission access levels, the name of the computer where the queue is located, the queue description, and the queue category.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry"></xref>具有指定之權限存取類別層級的佇列所在的電腦、 佇列描述和佇列類別目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.PermissionAccess*> property is set to this value.
The name of the computer where the Message Queuing queue is located.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列 」 佇列所在之電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.MachineName*> property is set to this value.
The queue description.
The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.Label*> property is set to this value.
The queue category (Message Queuing type identifier).
trans-unit.target: 佇列類別目錄 （訊息佇列類型識別碼）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntry.Category*> property is set to this value.
Gets the queue category.
The queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.
trans-unit.target: 允許將其佇列分類的應用程式佇列類別 （訊息佇列類型識別碼，）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the queue description.
The label for the message queue.
Gets the name of the computer where the Message Queuing queue is located.
trans-unit.target: 取得訊息佇列 」 佇列所在之電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer where the queue is located.
trans-unit.target: 佇列所在之電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the queue's path.
The queue that is referenced by the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueue"></xref>.
Gets the permission access levels used in the permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 取得權限的存取層級權限要求中使用。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionAccess"></xref> values.
